Avionics Bay: Transition section avionics bay hatch. Located behind the right-side cargo door.
Stormscope Processor. Located inside the transition section, toward the upper right side, looking toward the tail.
Modem, Communications. Located inside the transition section.
Electronic Sequencing Unit, APU. Located in upper cabin section, behind soundproofing.
UHF-AM Mount Base Rec/Trans, MT-4838/ARC-164. Generally located immediately under RT-1614/ARC-164 (Fig. \ref{rt1614})
ADF Loop Antenna, AS-3933/ARN-149 and AS-4480/ARN-149. Directly aft of the sling hook, under the aircraft.
Upper rear section of the aircraft.
UHF-AM Antenna, AS-3524A/A. Square flat antenna under the rear portion of the cabin.
Mount Tray NPU. Located in the Transition Avionics bay on a mid-level shelf.
Undercarriage of the aircraft looking aft from the nose.
KY-100. Located in the aft avionics compartment, toward the top left when looking to the rear.
Sensor, EOMS. Located at the rear end of the vertical stabilizer.
